quote: If you are genuine, it can be extremely effective.
why_clipworthy: Highlights the power of authenticity in building trust and business.
suggested_hook: Discover why being genuine is your secret weapon in real estate.

quote: I would love to have a quick conversation with you and just give you my update on what I actually think your home might be worth.
why_clipworthy: Provides a specific tactic for REALTORS to engage with clients over Zestimates.
suggested_hook: How to turn Zestimates into client conversations.
